channel.title: CVE Feed for CHANGING -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CHANGING -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-3927|2024-08-04T07:52:20.395Z -- changing -- servisign%20windows%20versions
item.description: An arbitrary-file-access vulnerability exists in ServiSign security plugin, as long as the attackers learn the specific API function, they may access arbitrary files on target system via crafted API parameter.

item.title: CVE-2021-44161|2024-08-04T04:17:23.595Z -- changing -- motp%28mobile%20one%20time%20password%29
item.description: Changing MOTP (Mobile One Time Password) systemâ€™s specific function parameter has insufficient validation for user input. A attacker in local area network can perform SQL injection attack to read, modify or delete backend database without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2020-3925|2024-08-04T07:52:20.342Z -- changing -- servisign%20windows%20versions
item.description: A Remote Code Execution(RCE) vulnerability exists in some designated applications in ServiSign security plugin, as long as the interface is captured, attackers are able to launch RCE and executes arbitrary command on target system via malicious crafted scripts.

item.title: CVE-2020-3939|2024-08-04T07:52:20.607Z -- changing -- syuan-gu-da-shih
item.description: SysJust Syuan-Gu-Da-Shih, versions before 20191223, contain vulnerability of Cross-Site Scripting(XSS), personal information may be leaked to attackers via the vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-3938|2024-08-04T07:52:20.650Z -- changing -- syuan-gu-da-shih
item.description: SysJust Syuan-Gu-Da-Shih, versions before 20191223, contain vulnerability of Request Forgery, allowing attackers to launch inquiries into network architecture or system files of the server via forged inquests.

item.title: CVE-2020-3937|2024-08-04T07:52:20.576Z -- changing -- syuan-gu-da-shih
item.description: SQL Injection in SysJust Syuan-Gu-Da-Shih, versions before 20191223, allowing attackers to perform unwanted SQL queries and access arbitrary file in the database.

item.title: CVE-2020-3926|2024-08-04T07:52:20.665Z -- changing -- servisign%20windows%20versions
item.description: An arbitrary-file-access vulnerability exists in ServiSign security plugin, as long as the attackers learn the specific API function, they may access arbitrary files on target system via crafted API parameter.

item.title: CVE-2024-3123|2024-08-01T19:32:42.884Z -- changing -- mobile%20one%20time%20password
item.description: CHANGING Mobile One Time Password's uploading function in a hidden page does not filter file type properly. Remote attackers with administrator privilege can exploit this vulnerability to upload and run malicious file to execute system commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-3122|2024-08-01T19:32:42.703Z -- changing -- mobile%20one%20time%20password
item.description: CHANGING Mobile One Time Password does not properly filter parameters for the file download functionality, allowing remote attackers with administrator privilege to read arbitrary file on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-3122|2024-07-01T13:17:07.868Z -- changing -- mobile%20one%20time%20password
item.description: CHANGING Mobile One Time Password does not properly filter parameters for the file download functionality, allowing remote attackers with administrator privilege to read arbitrary file on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-3122|2024-07-01T02:39:14.560Z -- changing -- mobile%20one%20time%20password
item.description: CHANGING Mobile One Time Password does not properly filter parameters for the file download functionality, allowing remote attackers with administrator privilege to read arbitrary file on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-3123|2024-07-01T02:52:34.721Z -- changing -- mobile%20one%20time%20password
item.description: CHANGING Mobile One Time Password's uploading function in a hidden page does not filter file type properly. Remote attackers with administrator privilege can exploit this vulnerability to upload and run malicious file to execute system commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-3123|2024-07-02T14:21:02.687Z -- changing -- mobile%20one%20time%20password
item.description: CHANGING Mobile One Time Password's uploading function in a hidden page does not filter file type properly. Remote attackers with administrator privilege can exploit this vulnerability to upload and run malicious file to execute system commands.
